title: Playing Rimworld for the first time......
body:
of all the things to kill my first run.... manhunting yorkshire terriers were not on my list.  they snuck around and flanked where my turrets weren't set up.... I am laughing too hard to be upset, it was only a little while in as I am learning the game.

these sonsabitches are scary tho.... just look at that face

http://cdn3-www.dogtime.com/assets/uploads/gallery/yorkshireterrier-dog-breed-pictures/8-fly.jpg

death by floof
